code: import axios from'axios';export const BASE_URL='https://youtube-v31.p.rapidapi.com';const options={params:{maxResults:50},headers:{'X-RapidAPI-Key':process.env.REACT_APP_RAPID_API_KEY,'X-RapidAPI-Host':'youtube-v31.p.rapidapi.com'}};export const fetchFromAPI=async url=>{const{data}=await axios.get("".concat(BASE_URL,"/").concat(url),options);return data;};
